testCaseName: Search using a single valid Case ID
objective: Verify that the system allows searching with a single Case ID and returns the correct results.
preconditions: User is logged into the ALZ-NET Dashboard
User is on the Explore Data Page

testDataItems.label: Valid Case ID
testDataItems.description: Standard valid Case ID for positive test

testDataItems.label: Boundary Case ID (Max Length)
testDataItems.description: Maximum valid Case ID length (20 chars)

testDataItems.label: Case ID with Special Characters
testDataItems.description: Case ID containing dashes and underscores

testDataItems.label: Case ID with Lowercase
testDataItems.description: Case ID in lowercase (should be case-insensitive)

testDataItems.label: Case ID with Leading/Trailing Spaces
testDataItems.description: Case ID with spaces to test trimming

testDataItems.label: Non-existent Case ID
testDataItems.description: Case ID that does not exist in the system

testDataItems.label: Empty Case ID
testDataItems.description: Empty input to test required validation

testDataItems.label: Null Case ID
testDataItems.description: Null input to test system handling
